_header: Remembered by scriptures we find and read
_description: The Monk of Paris, a ‘Grateful Dead’ legend — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar2251.First Lines:
REmembryd by scriptures we fynde and RedeHolsum and holy it is to
                    thynke and pray…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…Therfor it is holsom for to have in memoryThe soulis that ly
                    In paynes of purgatory
BLHar2251.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard,
